overview: Scott Milsten was appointed Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary of Celera in November 2008. Previously, Mr. Milsten was Deputy General Counsel for Gen-Probe Incorporated (NASDAQ:GPRO). In this capacity, he managed corporate governance and securities compliance, and structured and negotiated strategic transactions. He also oversaw a variety of intellectual property and human resource matters. Prior to Gen-Probe, Mr. Milsten practiced corporate law with the law firm of Latham & Watkins LLP, where he specialized in mergers and acquisitions, proxy contests and securities offerings for life science and technology companies.
